author: Abraham Lincoln
message: The best thing about the future is that it only comes one day at a time.
title: Thought of the day

author: Epictetus
message: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Fear of failure is one attitude that will keep you at the same point in your life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ed Cunningham
message: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
title: Thought of the day
